response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which I believe would greatly enhance your operations or personal endeavors. Given its exceptional value and quality, I am offering it to you at an exclusive price of $12,000. This represents a significant savings compared to the market rate, making it a fantastic opportunity for you. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. I look forward to the possibility of working together.", "product_price": 12000}
